function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of information on infections within buildings at city level","Impact":"Difficulty in analyzing and predicting the spread of contagious diseases within built environments","Mitigation":"Enhance data collection and reporting on infections within buildings at a city level","Technologies":"Data collection systems and sensors for monitoring infections","People":"Public health authorities, building managers, and city officials","Owner":"Public health organizations, city governments, and building management companies"},{"Description":"Influence of inter-city connections on the spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of wide-scale transmission of contagious diseases between cities and regions","Mitigation":"Implement travel restrictions, health screenings, and quarantine measures for inter-city travelers","Technologies":"Travel monitoring systems, temperature screening technologies, and quarantine facilities","People":"Government agencies, transportation authorities, and public health departments","Owner":"Government agencies and transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Transport systems as vectors for disease spread within cities","Impact":"Facilitation of disease transmission through urban transport networks and people-to-people contacts","Mitigation":"Enhance sanitation and hygiene measures in public transport, promote social distancing, and implement contact tracing systems","Technologies":"Sanitation technologies, contactless payment systems, and contact tracing apps","People":"Urban transport authorities, city planners, and public health authorities","Owner":"Urban transport authorities and city governments"}]}
